text.section: any person committing in his presence any offense set forth in this chapter;
any person who he has probable cause to believe has committed or is committing a felony set forth under the provisions of this chapter; or

any person who he has probable cause to believe has committed or is committing a violation of the provisions of sections twenty-seven, thirty-two, thirty-two A, thirty-two B, thirty-two C, thirty-two D, thirty-two E, thirty-two F, thirty-three, thirty-four, thirty-five, thirty-seven and forty.
